verses.text: Nevertheless the \w dimness|strong="H4155"\w* \add shall\add* not \add be\add* such as \add was\add* in her \w vexation|strong="H4164"\w*, \w when|strong="H6256"\w* at the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* he lightly \w afflicted|strong="H7043"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w* and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, and \w afterward|strong="H0314"\w* did more grievously \w afflict|strong="H3513"\w* \add her by\add* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, in \w Galilee|strong="H1551"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.\f + \fr 9.1 \ft of the nations: or, populous\f*

The \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*: they that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the shadow of \w death|strong="H6757"\w*, upon them hath the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \w shined|strong="H5050"\w*.

Thou hast \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* the \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, \add and\add* not \w increased|strong="H1431"\w* the \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*: they \w joy|strong="H8055"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee according to the \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* in \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*, \add and\add* as \add men\add* \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* when they \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*.\f + \fr 9.3 \ft not: or, to him\f*

For thou hast \w broken|strong="H2865"\w* the \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* of his \w burden|strong="H5448"\w*, and the \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* of his \w shoulder|strong="H7926"\w*, the \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* of his \w oppressor|strong="H5065"\w*, as in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*.\f + \fr 9.4 \ft For…: or, When thou brakest\f*

For every \w battle|strong="H5430"\w* of the \w warrior|strong="H5431"\w* \add is\add* with confused \w noise|strong="H7494"\w*, and \w garments|strong="H8071"\w* \w rolled|strong="H1556"\w* in \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*; but \add this\add* shall be with \w burning|strong="H8316"\w* \add and\add* \w fuel|strong="H3980"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.\f + \fr 9.5 \ft For…: or, When the whole battle of the warrior was, etc\f*\f + \fr 9.5 \ft but…: or, and it was, etc\f*\f + \fr 9.5 \ft fuel: Heb. meat\f*

For unto us a \w child|strong="H3206"\w* is \w born|strong="H3205"\w*, unto us a \w son|strong="H1121"\w* is \w given|strong="H5414"\w*: and the \w government|strong="H4951"\w* shall be upon his \w shoulder|strong="H7926"\w*: and his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* shall be \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Wonderful|strong="H6382"\w*, \w Counsellor|strong="H3289"\w*, The \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, The \w everlasting|strong="H5703"\w* \w Father|strong="H0001"\w*, The \w Prince|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

Of the \w increase|strong="H4766"\w* of \add his\add* \w government|strong="H4951"\w* and \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \add there shall be\add* no \w end|strong="H7093"\w*, upon the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and upon his \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*, to \w order|strong="H3559"\w* it, and to \w establish|strong="H5582"\w* it with \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* and with \w justice|strong="H6666"\w* from henceforth even \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*. The \w zeal|strong="H7068"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* will \w perform|strong="H6213"\w* this.
¶ The \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* a \w word|strong="H1697"\w* into \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and it hath \w lighted|strong="H5307"\w* upon \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, \add even\add* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* and the \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, that \w say|strong="H0559"\w* in the \w pride|strong="H1346"\w* and \w stoutness|strong="H1433"\w* of \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*,

The \w bricks|strong="H3843"\w* are fallen \w down|strong="H5307"\w*, but we will \w build|strong="H1129"\w* with hewn \w stones|strong="H1496"\w*: the \w sycomores|strong="H8256"\w* are cut \w down|strong="H1438"\w*, but we will \w change|strong="H2498"\w* \add them into\add* \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w*.

Therefore the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall set \w up|strong="H7682"\w* the \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w* of \w Rezin|strong="H7526"\w* against him, and \w join|strong="H5526"\w* his \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w together|strong="H5526"\w*;\f + \fr 9.11 \ft join: Heb. mingle\f*

The \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w* \w before|strong="H6924"\w*, and the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w behind|strong="H0268"\w*; and they shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with open \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*. For all this his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* is not turned \w away|strong="H7725"\w*, but his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add is\add* stretched out \w still|strong="H5186"\w*.\f + \fr 9.12 \ft open: Heb. whole\f*

¶ For the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w turneth|strong="H7725"\w* not unto him that \w smiteth|strong="H5221"\w* them, neither do they \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

Therefore the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* and \w tail|strong="H2180"\w*, \w branch|strong="H3712"\w* and \w rush|strong="H0100"\w*, in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

The \w ancient|strong="H2205"\w* and \w honourable|strong="H6440"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \add is\add* the \w head|strong="H7218"\w*; and the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* that \w teacheth|strong="H3384"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*, he \add is\add* the \w tail|strong="H2180"\w*.

For the \w leaders|strong="H0833"\w* of this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* cause \add them\add* to \w err|strong="H8582"\w*; and \add they that are\add* \w led|strong="H0833"\w* of them \add are\add* \w destroyed|strong="H1104"\w*.\f + \fr 9.16 \ft the leaders: or, they that call them blessed\f*\f + \fr 9.16 \ft led of: or, called blessed of\f*\f + \fr 9.16 \ft destroyed: Heb. swallowed up\f*

Therefore the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* shall have no \w joy|strong="H8055"\w* in their young \w men|strong="H0970"\w*, neither shall have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* on their \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w* and \w widows|strong="H0490"\w*: for every one \add is\add* an \w hypocrite|strong="H2611"\w* and an \w evildoer|strong="H7489"\w*, and every \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* \w folly|strong="H5039"\w*. For all this his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* is not turned \w away|strong="H7725"\w*, but his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add is\add* stretched out \w still|strong="H5186"\w*.\f + \fr 9.17 \ft folly: or, villany\f*

¶ For \w wickedness|strong="H7564"\w* \w burneth|strong="H1197"\w* as the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: it shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* the \w briers|strong="H8068"\w* and \w thorns|strong="H7898"\w*, and shall \w kindle|strong="H3341"\w* in the \w thickets|strong="H5442"\w* of the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*, and they shall mount \w up|strong="H0055"\w* \add like\add* the lifting \w up|strong="H1348"\w* of \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w*.

Through the \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* is the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w darkened|strong="H6272"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall be as the \w fuel|strong="H3980"\w* of the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w spare|strong="H2550"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.\f + \fr 9.19 \ft fuel: Heb. meat\f*

And he shall \w snatch|strong="H1504"\w* on the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, and be \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*; and he shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* on the left \w hand|strong="H8040"\w*, and they shall not be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*: they shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of his own \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*:\f + \fr 9.20 \ft snatch: Heb cut\f*

\w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*; and \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*: \add and\add* they \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \add shall be\add* against \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*. For all this his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* is not turned \w away|strong="H7725"\w*, but his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add is\add* stretched out \w still|strong="H5186"\w*.
